body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Have 9 lands
2. Draw Entreat the Angels
3. Play it for Miracle cost What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Expected: 7 Angel creatures some into play

Actual: the game prompts for X. I choose 7 (suggested by default). The game taps all lands, but doesn't create any Angels. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Magarena 1.39 on Windows 7 If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Relevant parts of game.log:

LOG (P): Tap Plains. Tap Plains. Tap Glacial Fortress. Tap Island. Tap Island. Tap Island. Tap Plains. Tap Seachrome Coast. Tap Seachrome Coast.
LOG (P): You may (yes) cast this card for its miracle cost Play Entreat the Angels.
LOG (P): Igor puts 0 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield.
